alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Harper (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 04 at 3:45AM CST until March 05 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Saturday... .A dryline will progress across western and central Oklahoma, and western north Texas on Saturday. Behind this dryline, very warm, dry, and windy conditions are expected. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR NORTHWEST OKLAHOMA... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Saturday morning through Saturday evening. The Fire Weather Watch that was in effect for Friday has been cancelled. * TIMING...10 AM Saturday to 8 PM Saturday. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 9 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs in the mid 70s to around 80. * IMPACTS...Any fires that start will be difficult to contain.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
